2:30 » Ludlow

THU 4 MAR 2010

Tenbury High School "Racing For Schools" Novices´ Hurdle (CLASS 4) (4yo+) Winner £3,253RUK
Good To Soft 2m Number of runners: 16

SHOW:

Cards help

£5,000 guaranteed For 4yo+ which have not won more than three hurdles Weights 4yo.10st 7lb; 5yo+ 11st 1lb Penalties each hurdle won 6lb Allowances fillies and mares 7lb Entries 32 pay £ 20 Penalty value 1st £3,252.50 2nd £955.00 3rd £477.50 4th £238.50

Our expert's view of the main contenders and likely winner of the race. Part of RACINGPOST.com Members' Club
